title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.62 - Authorized tanning facilities licensing and inspection program; performance standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.62 - Authorized tanning facilities licensing and inspection program; performance standards

State Regulations

Where a local health department's health officer has received authorization to act as a permit-issuing official for the licensing and inspection of tanning facilities pursuant to Subpart 72-1 of this Title, the municipality shall conduct such program consistent with that Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
40-2.62

Amended, New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
